name: Tropical Rain
description: A light, sweet refreshing Rum drink. Highlighting an almost lost art of using Fassionola syrup.  With a touch of mint to make it cool and crisp in while enjoying rain or shine!
directions: Mix the syrups and water to dilute.
Combine rum and other mixture in shaker with ice and shake 20 seconds.
Pour into glass filled with crushed ice.
The dilution helps cut the sweetness of the cocktail.  For sweeter use less water or shake for less time or both.
